name: Bill's PC
description:
Bill's PC is an expansion for Pokemon Dungeon Crawler that adds additional and variant rules used for my own games as well as some additional content.

This project includes:

  • Rules to help map out your own dungeons
  • Rules for a bartering versus monetary based in game economy
  • Treasure tables for generating loot as well as plenty of new items to fill those tables such as accessories and held items
  • Alternate rules for evolution that make it a long term effect, similar to a level up
  • Rules to add additional grit and consequences to your game, particularly in a campaign style playthrough
  • Evolutions for Farfetch'd and Tangela
  • A story prompt for a Pokemon Dungeon Crawler campaign set in the Kanto region
